list_definition.definition: one of the things that grow from a bird’s skin that form the covering of its body

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They cleaned the oil off the seagull’s feathers.

list_definition.definition: to line, cover or decorate with feathers

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The eagle feathers its nest with down from its own breast.
